Trend Research ทิ้ง ETH กว่า 400K เหรียญ เมื่อความเสี่ยงการถูกบังคับปิดสถานะเพิ่มสูงขึ้น

Trend Research dumps over 400K ETH as liquidation risk rises

30m ago//Cointelegraph by Zoltan Vardai
ethereum
AI

Summary

TH

บริษัท ลงทุน Ethereum อย่าง Trend Research ได้ลดการถือครองของตนลงอย่างมหาศาล โดยขาย Ethereum ออกไปกว่า 400,000 ETH หลังจากราคาตลาดตกต่ำเพื่อใช้ชำระหนี้ บริษัท ได้โอน ETH ประมาณ 411,075 เหรียญไปยัง Binance ในเดือนนี้ ซึ่งลดยอดคงเหลือจาก 651,170 ETH เหลือเพียงประมาณ 247,080 ETH การดำเนินการนี้เกิดขึ้นเมื่อราคา ETH ดิ่งลงเกือบ 30% จนถึงระดับ $1,748 ทำให้บริษัท เผชิญความเสี่ยงใกล้กับระดับการถูก Liquidation ซึ่งบริษัท ดังกล่าวเชื่อมโยงกับ Jack Yi ผู้ก่อตั้ง Liquid Capital ได้ใช้กลยุทธ์การซื้อด้วยเงินกู้ผ่าน Aave เพื่อสะสม Ethereum เพิ่มเติม ข้อมูลจาก Blockchain ระบุว่าบริษัท เผชิญกับระดับการถูก Liquidation ในช่วงราคาระหว่าง $1,698 และ $1,562 แม้จะมีการขายออกมา Yi ยังคงมองโลกในแง่ดีในระยะยาวแต่ยอมรับว่าคาดการณ์ราคาตั้งต้นเร็วเกินไป และเน้นย้ำถึงความจำเป็นในการจัดการความเสี่ยงในช่วงนี้

EN

Ethereum investment vehicle Trend Research has significantly reduced its holdings, dumping over 400,000 ETH as market prices crashed to repay loans. The firm transferred approximately 411,075 ETH to Binance this month, cutting its total holdings from 651,170 ETH to around 247,080 ETH. This deleveraging move occurred as ETH price dropped nearly 30%, falling as low as $1,748 on Friday, bringing the company closer to liquidation levels. Linked to Liquid Capital founder Jack Yi, Trend Research utilized a leveraged strategy by borrowing stablecoins on Aave to accumulate ETH. Blockchain data indicates the firm faces potential liquidation levels between $1,698 and $1,562. Despite the sell-off, Yi maintains a long-term bullish outlook but admitted to calling the market bottom too early and emphasized the necessity of managing risk during the downturn.

Key Points

  • Trend Research sold over 400,000 ETH and transferred funds to Binance to cover debts.
  • The firm faces liquidation risks between $1,698 and $1,562 due to leveraged positions on Aave.
  • ETH price dropped nearly 30% this week, triggering the need for risk management.

Article

Ethereum investment vehicle Trend Research continued to reduce its Ether exposure, as the latest market crash pushed the treasury company to sell off its assets to pay back loans. It held about 651,170 Ether ( ETH ) in the form of Aave Ethereum wrapped Ether (AETHWETH) on Sunday. That amount dropped by 404,090, to about 247,080 on Friday, at the time of writing. Trend Research transferred 411,075 ETH to cryptocurrency exchange Binance since the beginning of the month, according to blockchain data platform Arkham. The transfers occurred as ETH price dropped almost 30% in the past week, to as low as $1,748 on Friday, according to CoinMarketCap. It traded at $1,967 at the time of writing. Trend Research, WETH token balance history, one-week chart. Source: Arkham Related: Sharplink pockets $33M from Ether staking, deploys another $170M ETH Trend Research continues risk management as ETH liquidation level approaches Trend Research has been tied to Jack Yi, founder of Hong Kong-based crypto venture firm Liquid Capital. Yi accumulated his Ethereum investment company’s holdings by purchasing ETH at an exchange, using that as collateral on Aave to borrow stablecoins, then using those funds to acquire more ETH. Trend Research faces multiple ETH liquidation levels between $1,698 and $1,562, wrote blockchain data platform Lookonchain in a Friday X post . Trend Research liquidation levels. Source: Lookonchain Yi, said in a Thursday X post that he remains bullish despite admitting that he called for a bottom in crypto valuation too early and will continue to wait for a market recovery while "managing risk." Related: BitMine buys $105M Ether to kick off 2026, still holds $915M in cash Trend Research came into the spotlight days after the $19 billion liquidation event of October 2025, when the investment firm began its aggressive Ether accumulation. Trend Research would have ranked as the third-largest Ether holder in December , but as an unlisted company, it doesn’t appear on most tracking websites. Bitmine, the largest public corporate Ether holder, was sitting on about $8 billion in unrealized profit on Friday.
